required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Drug Interaction Between HS-10234 and Emtriccitabine
clinical_study.official_title: Study on the Drug Interaction of HS-10234 and Emtricitabine in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The study is being conducted to evaluate drug interaction between HS-10234 and Emtricitabine after multiple dose in healthy subjects.

detailed_description.textblock: The study includes two parts. Part 1 is to evaluate the impact of Emtricitabine on HS-10234. Part 2 is to evaluate the impact of HS-10234 on Emtricitabine.

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics parameters of HS-10234 and it's metabolite tenofovir, Emtricitabine
Pharmacokinetics parameters of HS-10234 and it's metabolite tenofovir, Emtricitabine

secondary_outcome.measure: Concentration of HS-10234's metabolite tenofovir-diphosphate in peripheral blood mononuclear cells.

secondary_outcome.description: laboratory abnormalities (based on hematology, biochemistry, and urinalysis tests)

arm_group.arm_group_label: single arm for each part: two arms
arm_group.description: PART1:In the first period, HS-10234 will be administered at 25 mg QD for 7 days. In the second period, HS-10234 at 25 mg in combination with Emtricitabine at 200 mg will be administered QD for 7 days. PART2:In the first period, Emtricitabine will be administered at 200 mg QD for 7 days. In the second period, HS-10234 at 25 mg in combination with Emtricitabine at 200 mg will be administered QD for 7 days.

intervention.arm_group_label: single arm for each part: two arms
single arm for each part: two arms

overall_official.affiliation: Xiangya Hospital of Central South University
